page.title: 09THE DEVILS ARROWS
page.content: At one time there were 4 arrows, but the bridge was in need of repair, so they used one of the arrows to repair the bridge.There is a special mark on the bridge its like a little arrow with a stick on the top so if you go to a certain part of the bridge you will see this picture. the legend goes like this: The devil in attempt to destroy Aldborough said "Borobrigg, keep o'way, For Aldborough town I will ding down!" Now a days people say that he stood on a hill and threw an arrow which split into 4 pieces and they landed near Boroughbridge. When you go to see the arrows you will see why they are called the Three Devils Arrows.
